nodes.bodyText: This is the actual thing that overrides the printing of tabs with whatever indentation style is present in the source file. I'm not completely satisfied with this solution as it seems a bit hacky, but I couldn't figure out a better way to do it. Suggestions are welcome.
The token writer is updated with indentation style for each CU to be printed.
Could you add a comment about the strategy that you choosed? (Relying on type members).
